title: configuration
content: # `prefect.logging.configuration` ## Functions ### `load_logging_config` ```python theme={null} load_logging_config(path: Path) -> dict[str, Any] ``` Loads logging configuration from a path allowing override from the environment ### `setup_logging` ```python theme={null} setup_logging(incremental: bool | None = None) -> dict[str, Any] ``` Sets up logging. Returns the config used.
